name: bitsss

body.origin:
|- wss(cfv(cbits, c0), cn0)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbits, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cn0))
-| diffsc(hs0, cfv(cbits, c0))
-| diffsc(hs0, cn0)
body.pretty:
⊢ (bits ` c0)⊆ ℕ0
⊣ (hs0 ∈(bits ` c0)→ hs0 ∈ ℕ0)
⊣ d(hs0,(bits ` c0))
⊣ d(hs0, ℕ0)

comment: The set of bits of an integer is a subset of ` NN0 ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Sep-2016.)
